summary: Gordon Patrick (Nick Moran), a young CIA analyst is assigned to investigate the mysterious death of a major Russian political figure.
cast: Tara Reid|Nick Moran|Gregg Henry|Patrick Gallagher|James D. Deck|Oleg Stefan|Igor Staroseltsev|Georgiy Martirosyan|Irina Grigoreva|Aleksandr Fastovskiy|Robert F. Lyons|James Keane|Sergei Konov|Veronika Izotova|Lyubov Germanova|Elena Doronina|Vasanth Santosham|Aleksandr Pyatkov|Elena Ivochkina|Katrina M. Faessel
title: Juego de espías
